BugInstance.message: Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqltranslator.jooq.JooQSQLTranslator.translate(String, SQLStatement, DatabaseType, DatabaseType) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqltranslator.jooq.JooQSQLTranslator.translate(String, SQLStatement, DatabaseType, DatabaseType) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
